thread.title: This Video Of Sonakshi Sinha Will Give You A Reason To Smile Today
thread.title_full: This Video Of Sonakshi Sinha Will Give You A Reason To Smile Today

title: This Video Of Sonakshi Sinha Will Give You A Reason To Smile Today
text:
facebook 368 SHARES 
Sonakshi Sinha is very active on social media, and her Instagram feed is filled with a mix of pictures and videos that really show off her personality. While we all know Sonakshi can sing and rap, as she has demonstrated in the past, a recent Instagram video of her singing is just out of this world. Singing the song Drops Of Jupiter by Train, she sounds beautiful, and we love the raw quality of her voice. Take a look at the video, here. We're sure it'll make you smile.
